channel.title: Random GFX Code Help/Request
channel.description: Well, I have the list of GFX's and animations, but I want to make codes called ::randomgfx NUMBERHERE and ::randomanim NUMBERHERE that does a random animation/gfx each time. I've googled and searched the forums, but I can't find any and I think this is the right place to put it. Can someone tell me how to do this? :confused: Sorry if this is in the wrong forum or anything.

item.title: Random GFX Code Help/Request
item.dc:creator: @Land Land
item.description:
@Land wrote:

Well, I have the list of GFX’s and animations, but I want to make codes called ::randomgfx NUMBERHERE and ::randomanim NUMBERHERE that does a random animation/gfx each time.
I’ve googled and searched the forums, but I can’t find any and I think this is the right place to put it. Can someone tell me how to do this?
Sorry if this is in the wrong forum or anything.

Read full topic
